mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shop.review_b ORDER BY rb_seq ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop.review_b (rb_seq, rb_title, smb_id, rb_content, rb_create, rb_update) VALUES (#{rbSeq}, #{rbTitle}, #{smbId}, #{rbContent}, NOW(), NOW())

INSERT INTO shop.review_f (rb_seq, rb_orig_file, rb_file_path, rb_file_size) VALUES
(#{item.rbSeq}, #{item.rbOrigFile}, #{item.rbFilePath}, #{item.rbFileSize})
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE((SELECT MIN(seq + 1) FROM ( SELECT 0 AS seq UNION ALL SELECT rb_seq FROM shop.review_b ) AS t1 WHERE seq + 1 NOT IN (SELECT rb_seq FROM shop.review_b)), 1) AS rbSeq
